channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Db2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Db2

item.title: CVE-2019-4014|2024-09-16T17:54:01.151Z -- ibm -- db2
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-Force ID: 155892.
